subject: The #1 metric most SaaS founders ignore (and why it's costing you)
preview: It's not MRR, ARR, or even churn rate...
body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Most founders obsess over MRR. But there's a metric that predicts churn 2 weeks before it happens.

It's called the Engagement Velocity Score (EVS).

EVS measures how quickly users adopt core features after signup. A dropping EVS means trouble - even if your MRR looks healthy.

FlowMetrics calculates your EVS automatically. No manual tracking needed.

Here's what one of our users found:
